name: MISSION CHANDRAYAN
description:
Hey Guys,

After A long gap I am releasing my second game Mission Chandrayan. This game is about to reach the end to make your country reach moon. If you pass the 3rd Level then you are a GOD. 

CONTROLS:-

Thrust - Space 

Right -  D/d 

Left - A/a

NOTE:- 

Any suggestions for new levels and any bugs will be highly appreciated . 

IN LEVEL 2 The Landing Pad is only half visible so it makes it tough to land.

To Play the game use full screen option. 

Thanks For Playing My Game.
